attributes.title: Dante VS Bayonetta
attributes.caption: DEATH BATTLE is back with a match made in heaven! From Devil May Cry and the Umbra Witches, who will come out on top?

attributes.title: Bowser VS Ganon (Mario VS Zelda)
attributes.caption: Two of Nintendo's all-time favorite bosses square off in a battle of all that is evil.

attributes.title: Ratchet & Clank VS Jak & Daxter
attributes.caption: It's the battle of the dynamic duos! Which of these PlayStation all-stars will demolish the competition?
attributes.description: It's the battle of the dynamic duos! Which of these PlayStation all-stars will demolish the competition?This episode of sponsored by our newest game AVGN II! We greatly appreciate your support!Show some love and look great. Pick up some NEW DEATH BATTLE and ScrewAttack merchandise in our NEW store

attributes.title: Flash VS Quicksilver (DC VS Marvel)
attributes.caption: DC and Marvel clash in a death race, and only one speedster will survive! Who really is the fastest man alive?

attributes.title: Joker VS Sweet Tooth (DC VS Twisted Metal)
attributes.caption: Two crazy clowns enter the arena, and only one will survive! Will DC Comics' Joker have the last laugh against the violent champion of Twisted Metal?​
attributes.display_title: Joker VS Sweet Tooth (DC VS Twisted Metal)

attributes.title: Mewtwo VS Shadow (Pokémon VS Sonic the Hedgehog)
attributes.caption: The ultimate life forms from Pokemon and Sonic square off! It's a battle of awesome power and pure edginess!
attributes.display_title: Mewtwo VS Shadow (Pokémon VS Sonic the Hedgehog)

attributes.title: Cammy VS Sonya (Street Fighter VS Mortal Kombat)
attributes.caption: It's Street Fighter versus Mortal Kombat! Two iconic military stunners across the pond from each other will duel, but only one will survive.
attributes.description: It's Street Fighter versus Mortal Kombat! Two iconic military stunners across the pond from each other will duel, but only one will survive.
attributes.display_title: Cammy VS Sonya (Street Fighter VS Mortal Kombat)

attributes.title: Tracer VS Scout (Overwatch VS Team Fortress 2)
attributes.caption: There’s a new scout in town, and the old cream of the crop has some competition!
attributes.description: There's anew scout in town, and the old cream of the crop has some competition! Can the Scout's experience and wacky tactics take down the high-speed finesse ofTracer? Two will enter, but only one will live.Love DEATH BATTLE? Watch episodes early for a FREE 30 day trial: We greatly appreciate your support!
attributes.display_title: Tracer VS Scout (Overwatch VS Team Fortress 2)

attributes.title: Ken VS Terry (Street Fighter VS King of Fighters)
attributes.caption: Fiery, fierce, and red. It's time to crown America's top fighting champion!
attributes.display_title: Ken VS Terry (Street Fighter VS King of Fighters)

attributes.title: Amy Rose VS Ramona Flowers (Sonic the Hedgehog VS Scott Pilgrim)
attributes.caption: They may have bad boy habits, but they also carry giant hammers. Don't mess with these vicious vixens.
attributes.display_title: Amy Rose VS Ramona Flowers (Sonic the Hedgehog VS Scott Pilgrim)

attributes.title: Hulk VS Doomsday (Marvel VS DC)
attributes.caption: It's Marvel vs DC as two titans clash in the ultimate battle between the unstoppable and the immovable!
attributes.description: It's Marvel vs DC as two titans clash in the ultimate battle between the unstoppable and the immovable!

attributes.title: Zoro VS Erza (One Piece VS Fairy Tail)
attributes.caption: It's pirate versus mage in this duel of anime blades! They hope to be the best of the best, and this battle will prove it!
attributes.description: It's pirate versus mage in this duel of anime blades! They hope to be the best of the best, and this battle will prove it! CREDITSWiz/Showrunner: Ben B. Singer          Boomstick: Chad James          Project Lead: Nick Cramer          Animator: Luis Cruz             Battle Sound Design: Noel Wiggins  Battle Music: Brandon Yates     Battle Announcer: Christopher Guerrero  Voice Direction: Marissa Lenti     Voice of Erza: Katelyn Barr     Voice of Zoro: Kaiji Tang     Editor: John Francis McCullagh     Writer: Jessica Davis     Writer/Project Lead: Sam Mitchell
attributes.display_title: Zoro VS Erza (One Piece VS Fairy Tail)

attributes.title: Deadpool VS Pinkie Pie (Marvel VS My Little Pony)
attributes.caption: Fiction is fragile. When two beings capable of seeing through their own reality face off in a duel to the death, what could possibly go wrong?
attributes.description: Fiction is fragile. When two beings capable of seeing through their own reality face off in a duel to the death, what could possibly go wrong? It's the merc with a mouth versus the super party pony!   GOT AN IDEA FOR A DEATH BATTLE?
attributes.display_title: Deadpool VS Pinkie Pie (Marvel VS My Little Pony)
